value.name: 10 Cops Got Qualified Immunity After Holding a Shackled Man Facedown Until He Died
value.description: He would not leave alive. The 10 cops who handcuffed, shackled, and subdued him facedown on the ground of that cell until he stopped breathing did not deploy excessive force and thus cannot be sued over the incident,

value.name: Which law enforcement agencies in Escambia and Santa do — and don't — use body cameras?
value.description: Most — but not all — law enforcement agencies in Escambia and Santa Rosa counties use body cameras. Here's a list of what each agency does.

value.name: 'Maya's Mind' 20-foot art sculpture installed Saturday in the downtown Carson City area
value.description: On Saturday afternoon, a new art installation was brought to downtown Carson City thanks to a small group of art lovers who wanted to help bring more culture for all of the public to enjoy. “Maya’s Mind” created by artist Mischell Riley was installed at 377 S.

value.name: Fishing Report: The sun is hot and the days are longer, a perfect recipe for spring fishing
